ygData.subject: RE: Fw: [EQ-Rangers] Dueling a Bard
ygData.msgSnippet: Dirge rocks in duels.  Especially against paladins that like to wait til the last minute before they resort to lay on hands :) Elwyn Heartstring Level 50 Bard
ygData.messageBody:
Dirge rocks in duels. Especially against paladins that like to wait til the
last minute before they resort to lay on hands :)


Elwyn Heartstring
Level 50 Bard of Erollisi Marr

-----Original Message-----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
[mailto:Michael.Garramone@...]
Sent: Wednesday, December 08, 1999 2:31 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Fw: [EQ-Rangers] Dueling a Bard


From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>

bards are great against casters, poor against melee. i win almost all of my
duels against casters, but have not won against melee yet. i try not to
employ tactics such as kiting or fear/chain in duels, just to be more
challenging. i fought 2 level 50 rangers 3 times. the 1st ranger times i
got him to about 35-40% health both times and died, once with weapons and
once with lute only. the 2nd ranger i got to 21hp with lute only, have not
tried her with weapons and different song strategies. i wanna try again.
btw, my favorite part of any duel is dirge. love that 325 nuke to change
the tide of the fight.

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L31 High Elf Wizard
Manda D'ulin, L22 Wood Elf Warrior
Mithaniel Marr Server
